articles.description: As the nation's PE teacher goes part-time, here's what to do on his days off
articles.content: Listen: Joe Wicks needs a break. Since the 23rd of March thats roughly three months or a geological eon ago, depending on how lockdowns warped your sense of time hes been tirelessly turning up on TV … [+1530 chars]

articles.author: Guy Lodge
articles.title: Oscars 2021: how shifting the awards later favours the old guard - The Guardian
articles.description: Embracing streaming was a step in the right direction, but the calendar shift has given distributors an extra two months to get their big-ticket releases into cinemas
articles.content: The most recent Academy Awards ceremony took place on 9 February, the earliest date in the institutions 92-year history, as a calendar-shifting experiment that was largely not embraced by the industr… [+4570 chars]
